worksectionDet: Here are few of my work experience
artexacta_desc: I worked as a consultant (2018-2020) focused entrely on web development. My mains functions were:
artexacta_1: Technical support searching errors and develop software fixes for internal systems developed by Artexacta.
artexacta_2: Developed new functionalities required by the clients.
artexacta_3: Collaborated with the creation of new modules for a human resources system.
megasystem_desc: I worked with a freelancer contract, the activities that I developed in this company are:
megasystem_1: Developed a data synchronization system using Angular 8 (frontend) and Web Api c# (backend).
megasystem_2: Collaborated with the creation of new functionalities for an invoicing system.
networking_desc: Networking Consulting is a digital marketing company, I worked with a freelancer contract, the activities that I developed in this company are:
networking_1: Developed business websites with corporate emails using PHP and MySQL.
objetivo_desc: Give the maximum work performance to meet the objectives of the company, gain more experience to grow as a professional and never stop learning.
